name: Drive-and-sit
body:
# drive |sit
## fea 6x4  
mod_acc_mag,absMin_acc_mag,absMax_acc_mag (mean std min max for 50 window)

### not ensemble,try 10 times, not overlap trainset test
* nn average accuracy not ensemble 47.0
* adaboost 0.913888888889
* lr 0.880555555556
* svm 0.805555555556
* rf 0.922222222222



##ã€€fea 12 
only mag,no acc


* nn average accuracy not ensemble 55.0
* adaboost 0.919444444444
* lr 0.919444444444
* svm 0.758333333333
* rf 0.944444444444

## fea 6x4 acc mag,since mag[50,300] acc[0,30],remove noise,normalize each dim

* maxDep 6 try10times average  not ensemble 0.904 max 0.98 min 0.8
* maxDep 8 try10times average  not ensemble 0.86 max 0.94 min 0.7
* maxDep 10 try10times average  not ensemble 0.912 max 0.94 min 0.84
* maxDep 12 try10times average  not ensemble 0.876 max 0.94 min 0.78
* maxDep 14 try10times average  not ensemble 0.89 max 0.92 min 0.84
* maxDep 16 try10times average  not ensemble 0.912 max 0.96 min 0.82
* maxDep 18 try10times average  not ensemble 0.878 max 0.94 min 0.74
* maxDep 20 try10times average  not ensemble 0.886 max 0.94 min 0.82
* maxDep 22 try10times average  not ensemble 0.894 max 0.96 min 0.84
* maxDep 24 try10times average  not ensemble 0.89 max 0.96 min 0.8
* maxDep 26 try10times average  not ensemble 0.92 max 0.98 min 0.86
* maxDep 28 try10times average  not ensemble 0.884 max 0.96 min 0.84

### now ensemble

try 10 times ensemble-dt average 0.924 min max 0.84 1.0
